message: Fair 60-40 split, don't wait for inflation to kick in!
Let's flip the script. I propose a 60-40 split in my favor.  It's a good deal, and we can both avoid the sting of inflation.
Inflation is hitting you harder, don't wait! 65-35 is a good compromise.
Let's be reasonable.  A 50-50 split is the fairest way to split the money now.  We can avoid any more potential losses due to inflation.
You're losing value fast, 70-30 is the best you'll get. Don't risk another round!
